headline: Occidental Petroleum Eyes Modest Gains as Piper Sandler Nudges Price Target Higher
summary: Occidental Petroleum Corporation (NYSE:OXY) is one of the best commodity stocks to buy. On July 17, 2025, Piper Sandler analyst Ryan Todd maintained a “Neutral” rating on Occidental Petroleum while raising the price target from $48 to $50, signaling a modest upside of roughly 14.6% based on recent trading levels. The commentary emphasized Occidental’s ongoing […]
